attributes.action: Reform the Housing Benefit System. Equality Between Mortgage and Council/Private Teneants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Council/private tentant, their rent is covered from day one should their circumstances change and they need to use the housing benefit system.
Not so if you are a mortgage payer, you are not entitled to benefit for up to 9months, then only the interest is paid.
Mortgage payers are discriminated against.
They should have the same benefit rights as council tenants.
Housing benefit should be paid to mortgage payers  on the understanding that any monies paid to them will be paid back upon sale of their property from the profits.
